title: Retailer Places a Bulk Order
description: A retail chain places a large purchase order for multiple products to stock its stores for the upcoming season.

tasks.description: Receive the purchase order from the retailer and enter it into the order management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a new sales order with all items and quantities from the retailer's PO.

tasks.description: Check inventory levels for all items on the order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that all items are in stock and can be fulfilled completely.

tasks.description: Send an order confirmation to the retailer with an estimated shipping date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a formal confirmation email to the customer.
